full_text: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To Charisma Edge, Lamine N'Diaye, Lee Plourde (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) NYM/Executive Staff (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/26 10:10 Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances? Thank you, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Mr (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>> Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm. Thank you. (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Page 1861 DOJ-OGR-00023683

text_blocks.content: To Charisma Edge, Lamine N'Diaye, Lee Plourde (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) NYM/Executive Staff (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), suggesting sensitive information has been withheld.
